name: CUBYLUSION - Demo
description:
CUBYLUSION - demo

After being trapped inside a virtual world,  you alone, try to get out and save your friend Ramma. To do so, you have to get trough puzzles, escape this virtual prison, and finally save your friend. Could you do this?

This is a demo of the game,  only the two first worlds of the game are here. If you wish to support me, you can always donate! (This is my first game ever)

If you have comments or reviews, leave them here! I will read each of them with love!
